title: Gloves, 1600–50
medium:
Medium: leather, silk, metallic thread
Technique: leather glove with satin cuff, embroidered in metallic threads, with woven fringe
inscribed: Stamped on lining: Collezione Simonetta Roma
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Pair of white leather gloves with deep gauntlets of dark red satin. The gauntlets are embroidered in gold thread with a small repeating design of fleur de lis, and are edged with gold fringe. Lined with yellow silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Gloves, 1600–50.
1600–50. Medium: leather, silk, metallic thread
Technique: leather glove with satin cuff, embroidered in metallic threads, with woven fringe. Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1941-86-1-a,b.
